Newstrain, April 7, 2018

Slides

Finding records on your beat tip sheet

The NewsTrain tip sheet, Data-Driven Enterprise Off Your Beat.

Download files:

Here are some Excel files we’ll be practicing with in class:

  • Phoenix temperatures each day in 2017
  • Measles vaccinations by school in Arizona, 2016-2017
  • Opioid emergency calls, Tempe

Learning Excel

  • A set of resources for learning Excel
  • Consider joining IRE and buying a subscription to NICAR-Learn, which has quick video trainings in all kinds of skills.

What’s next?

Once you get pretty good at Excel, you’ll run into the biggest challenge most reporters face: extracting data from ugly forms and from the web.

  • How to deal with pdfs. It’s worth spending some money on a copy of software to help you. Really.
  • Simple scraping and looking under a website’s hood.

This project is maintained by sarahcnyt
